bard: At the start of your turn, you may discard 1 spell then add 1 spell from your discard pile to your hand.
At the start of your turn (and after you reset your hand), you may discard 1 spell then add 1 spell from your discard pile to your hand.

You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (+2) to a check by another character at your location. If the recharged card has the Healing trait, recharge a random card from your discard pile.
